issue.title: Update brew packages for macOS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2732](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2732). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I got the error when building on macOS.

 

```
$ ./autogen.sh
sh: aclocal: command not found
autoreconf: aclocal failed with exit status: 127
```

 

To run autogen.sh successfully, i need to install automake package.
